info.title: OPERA Cloud Front Desk Configuration API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Front Desk Configuration in OPERA Cloud. Here you can find operations to get, post, put and delete front desk codes such as commission codes, transaction groups, codes & subgroups, articles, payment methods and credit card types.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 21.3.0.0.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (http://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2021, 2022 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

get.description:
The operation accepts Cashier fetch request and returns Cashiers' list that match the criteria.

OperationId:getCashiers

parameters.name: cashierIDs
parameters.description: Numberic code for cashier ID.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Partial name of a cashier.

parameters.description: Indicator that tells whether to include inactive cashiers in search results.

200.description: Response object for fetching information regarding Cashiers.

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the end user is logged in

codeType.description: Used for codes in the OPERA Code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.

transactionCode.description: Transaction code to which the article belongs.

postIt.description: Post it information of the article.

universalProductCode.description: Unique Universal product code of the article.

hotelId.description: Hotel code to which the article belongs.

inactive.description: Indicates whether the article is inactive or not.

currencyAmountType.description: A monetary value expressed with a currency code.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

articlePostItType.description: Post it information of an article.

availableForPostIt.description: Indicates whether the article is available for post it.

color.description: Color indicator which is only configurable if article is available for post it.

colorType.description: Color configuration type. This color configuration provides a visual category of entities.

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success element to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning element MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

status.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

exceptionDetailType.title: Error Detail
exceptionDetailType.description: Complex type that contains error details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

o:errorDetails.description: Details of the error message, consisting of a hierarchical tree structure.

errorInstance.title: Error Instance Details
errorInstance.description: Complex type that contains error instance details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

authorizationConfigRuleType.description: Authorization configuration Rule Type.Authorization Rules specify the rule (or rules) that the property uses for credit card authorizations

rateCode.description: Rate code associated to this rule.

guaranteeCode.description: Guarantee code associated to this rule.

ruleDescription.description: Rule Number description for current authorization.

amount.description: Amount to be applied to all rules with an amount configured in the formula.

percentage.description: Percentage to be applied to all rules with a percentage configured in the formula.

maxDaysToAuthorize.description: A maximum of two digits to set the number of days to authorize for a credit card. If the field is left blank, authorizations will be done for the entire stay duration of the reservation

ignoreDepositsYN.description: Ignore deposits paid for calculation of the amount to be authorized.

roomClassCodeInfoType.description: Code of the room class type.

rateCategoryType.description: This type represents the rate category type.

rateCategoryDetails.description: Begin date for the rate category.

beginDate.description: Begin date for the rate category.

endDate.description: End date for the rate category.

rateClass.description: Active date of the room category.

criteria.description: Authorizer Groups Configuration to be changed.

updateAuthorizers.description: If true, updates all authorizers in the group.

authorizerGroups.description: Authorizer Groups Configuration to be changed.

authorizerGroupType.description: A representation of the information contained by a Authorizer Group.

rateCode.description: Rate Code of the Authorizer Group.

transactionLimits.description: Transactions information of the Authorizer Group.

hotelId.description: Hotel Code to which the Authorizer Group belongs to.

authorizerTrxLimitsType.description: Set of Transaction Limit configured for the Authorizer Group.

authorizerTrxLimitType.description: A representation of the information of Transaction Limit.

transactionCodes.description: Set of Transaction Codes configured for the Authorizer Group.

billingInstructions.description: Set of Billing Instructions configured for the Authorizer Group.

groupHeaderId.description: Group Header Id for a transaction row.

codeDescriptionType.description: This contains a generic code and description information.

autoFolioSettlementTypesDetails.description: Response object for fetching Auto Folio Settlement Types.

autoFolioSettlementTypes.description: Collection of Auto Folio Settlement Types.

autoFolioSettlementTypesType.description: List of Auto Folio Settlement Types.

translationTextType2000.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 2000.

translatedTexts.description: List of translated text and language codes.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 2000.

autoFolioSettlementTypesCriteria.description: Request object for creating Auto Folio Settlement Types.

autoFolioSettlementTypes.description: Auto Folio Settlement Typesto be created.

autoFolioSettlementTypesToBeChanged.description: Request object for changing Auto Folio Settlement Types.

autoFolioSettlementTypes.description: Auto Folio Settlement Typesto be changed.

cashiers.description: Lists of cashiers and their information.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

currencyCode.description: The currency code used by the hotel that the cashier belongs to.

cashierType.description: Cashier / Interface Cashier / LDAP Template options are provided.

startingAmount.description: The Starting Amount in the Cashier drawer.

floatOverShort.description: Selected if the cashier is allowed to drop below or above the required drop amount.

usageInfo.description: Information about how the cashier is used.

maximumDailyUses.description: The Maximum Daily Uses for the cashier.

history.description: Statistics about the use of the cashier.

lastOpened.description: The date that the cashier last opened.

timesOpened.description: The number of times the cashier has opened their account today.

kiosk.description: Indicator that this cashier is the one to be used by Kiosk Partner to carry out postings and payments for the guest.

inactive.description: Indicator that tells whether the cashier is active or not.

open.description: Indicator that tells whether the cashier is open or not.

cashiers.description: List of cashiers to be modified.

cashierId.description: The Cashier ID of the Cashier who is currently processing the transaction(s).

commissionCodesSummary.description: Response object for fetching commission codes.

description.description: Commission code description for which details are fetched.

commissionAmount.description: Commission amount that needs to be paid.

commissionCodes.description: Request object to update commission codes.

commissionCode.description: Commission code for which details are fetched.

description.description: Commission code description for which details are fetched.

commissionCalculation.description: Commission calculation type based on details.

holdAlways.description: Hold always status for commission code.

holdPrepaid.description: Hold prepaid status for commission code.

holdAccountReceivables.description: Hold accoutn receivables status for commission code.

commissionAmount.description: Commission amount that needs to be paid.

weekEndCommissionAmount.description: Commission amount that needs to be paid over weekend.

commissionType.description: Indicates the type of commission paid to agent.

commissionCalculationType.description: Commission calculation type based on details.

compTypeCode.description: Code is used to identify the CompType.

compTypeDescription.description: Text is used to describe the CompType.

compTypesToBeChanged.description: Request object for changing Comp Types.

compTypesStatus.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

branchCode.description: Code for the branch of the bank.

routingNumber.description: Routing number for the bank account.

paymentMethod.description: Type of payment associated with the bank account.

format.description: Type of format for Payment Method.

lastExportDate.description: Used to hold last exported date for commission export.

lastExportFileNo.description: Used to hold last exported filename for commission export.

nextCheckNumber.description: Next check number used by commission handling module for bank account selected.

minProcessingAmount.description: Minimum amount required to produce a check through commission processing for the selected account.

currency.description: Currency associated with the bank account.

checkStubLines.description: Number of lines to be printed on check stub.

sourceImportDirectory.description: Source directory for importing commission information.

targetImportDirectory.description: Target directory where import files will be stored.

editCheckNumber.description: Check number allowed to be edited true/false.

validateIATANumber.description: Force validation of TA/Source IATA number during commision payment process.

default.description: Default Bank Account for that resort.

defaultForCurrency.description: Used mainly to figure out default bank for resort and currency combination.

positivePayExport.description: Indicate that the bank account uses Positive Pay Export.

report1099.description: Indicates that bank account uses 1099 report.

commissionConfigPaymentMethodType.description: This value of the enum is used for Payment methods

tags.name: CashieringConfig
tags.description: Cashiering configurations affect the control and management of financial transactions at your property. You can configure cashiering components for articles for sale, cancellation handling, deposits, folios, settlements, exchange rates, payment methods and so on.

tags.name: CommissionConfig
tags.description: These Commission APIs allow you to get, update, and remove commissions on an Account Receivable (AR) profile in OPERA Cloud.

tags.name: ChainConfig
tags.description: These APIs will allow you to configure front office related configuration related to Administration.
